dct_title_s: Map of a portion of the Upper Tuscarawas River Basin showing soil conservation problem areas
dct_alternative_sm: Ohio water plan inventory. Soil Conservation Needs. Tuscarawas River Basin (Upper portion)
dct_description_sm: Scale bar lower left corner of map.
Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.
"Prepared by T.F. Boyce, T.R. Smith, F.J. Baker, Ohio Division of Lands and Soil"
Text includes information about Recommended Soil Consevation Practices in a portion of the Upper Tuscarawas River Basin.
